entry.title: C++ 分解偶数为两质数之和 - [C++]Decompose Even Numbers as the Sums of Two Primes
entry.content:
分解偶数为两质数之和的程序：
A program to decomposit even numbers as the sums of two primes:

``` c++ Source-源代码

include

include

using namespace std;

bool isprime(int x) {

if(x == 2) return 1;

if(x%2 == 0) return 0;

for(int i = 3; i <= sqrt((double)x); i += 2)
    if(x%i == 0) return 0;

return 1;

}

int main() {

int num;
while(cin >> num, num!=0)
{
    int sumCount = 0;
    for(int i = 2; i <= num/2; i++)
    {
        if(i != num - i)
            if(isprime(i) && isprime(num - i))
    {
            sumCount++;
                cout << i << '\t' << num - i << endl;
            }
    }
    cout << sumCount << endl;
}
return 0;

} ```
